Infraction - Class in objects
The Infraction class is a representation of an object in the school system.
Infraction(String, int, int, int, int, String) - Constructor for class objects.Infraction
This constructor builds an existing infraction, as the ID along with the other fields are set by the program parameters from the user.
Infraction(String, int, int, int, String) - Constructor for class objects.Infraction
This constructor builds a new infraction, as the ID is randomized.
IntroductionPanel - Class in graphics
The IntroductionPanel class contains the graphics necessary to create the introductory panel that greets users when opening the program.
IntroductionPanel() - Constructor for class graphics.IntroductionPanel
The constructor establishes the layout for the panel and adds the panel's sections to the overall panel itself.
InvalidFileInputException - Exception Class in files
The InvalidUserInputException is an exception that indicates if a user on file does not have all of the necessary information provided.
InvalidFileInputException() - Constructor for exception class files.InvalidFileInputException
This constructor establishes an InvalidUserInputException using a message with the name of the exception.
InvalidFileInputException(String) - Constructor for exception class files.InvalidFileInputException
This constructor establishes an InvalidUserInputException using a message provided by input.
isAdministrator() - Method in class objects.Administrator
Determines whether a user is an administrator.
isAdministrator() - Method in class objects.User
Determines whether a user is an administrator.
isPasswordValid(String) - Static method in class graphics.GraphicsHelpers
The isPasswordValid method takes in a password and sees if it meets several requirements.
isStudent() - Method in class objects.Student
Determines whether a user is a student.
isStudent() - Method in class objects.User
Determines whether a user is a student.
isTeacher() - Method in class objects.Teacher
Determines whether a user is a teacher.
isTeacher() - Method in class objects.User
Determines whether a user is a teacher.
